Flub.Name: Clamp
Flub.Description: The terrain is proportionally reduced in height.

Flub.Name: Clip
Flub.Description: The terrain is clipped beyond the extents provided.

Flub.Name: Extend
Flub.Description: The terrain is sharply extended beyond the extents provided.

Flub.Name: Drop to Floor
Flub.Description: Remove any excess height from the bottom of the terrain droppin the terrain to the floor.
